1.0.name: wordpress/minty-fresh
1.0.description:
This plugin will integrate the Mint Statistics app with your WordPress Administration. You can set it to have a Panel that shows an iframe of Mint or have it open in it's own window, or just use it to embed the Mint Javascript needed to log traffic.

Mint not included.
